attributes.action: ALL Dogs To Be Muzzled & Leashed In Public Places - DontBullyMyBreed
attributes.additional_details: I Think It's Unfair & Unfortunate That Responsible Dog Owners & Placid Bullys That Have Never Attacked Or Give Any Indication Of Aggression Are Being Penalised Because The Government Ignored Backyard Breeding  & Allowed These People To Continue With No Real Punishment Should Things Go Wrong Attacks Etc BackYard Breeding Should Be Stopped They Don't Care About The Dogs Or Where They Will End Up, If The New Owners Got Knowledge Of The Breed Etc - It's High Time They Was Held Accountable!!!
attributes.background: Rishi Sunak Has Decided There Will Be A Ban On XL Bullys By The End Of The Year - I Feel It's Only Right That All Dogs Should Be Muzzled & Leashed In Public Areas Not Just Bullys - As Responsible Owners That's What We Should Do! I Think If Owners Don't Comply They Should Be Held Accountable!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638225
Require leads, muzzles and licences for all dogs

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully
